chbPrimaryColor.name: Custom Hotbar Primary Color:
chbPrimaryColor.nameHint: Background color for the extra hotbar added by this module

chbBorderColor.name: Custom Hotbar Macro Slot Border Color:
chbBorderColor.nameHint: Border color for the border box around each macro

chbBorderColorActive.name: Custom Hotbar Macro Highlight Color:
chbBorderColorActive.nameHint: Color of the border around a filled macro slot when you hover over it with the mouse

chbBorderColorInactive.name: Primary Custom Hotbar Empty Macro Highlight Color:
chbBorderColorInactive.nameHint: Color of the border around an empty macro slot when you hover over it with the mouse

chbXPos.name: Position for the hotbar on the X axis:
chbXPos.nameHint: Higher values are further to the right of the screen horizontally

chbYPos.name: Position for the hotbar on the Y axis:
chbYPos.nameHint: Higher values are further up the screen vertically
